website_summaries.verdict: This packable cane folds up small enough to fit in a purse or travel bag.
pros: Collapsible, compact folding aluminum cane that fits in handbag or travel bag
Pivoting bottom for easy walking on indoor and outdoor terrains
6 built-in adjustable white LED lights help you see when walking at night

customer_reviews.title: Improvements over the hurry cane are three, quad base ...
customer_reviews.text: Improvements over the hurry cane are three, quad base stands on hard surfaces, flashlight and price. I thought the flashlight did not work. Then my husband showed me to unscrew the head of the flashlight and remove the protective plastic that keeps the battery from running down in shipment. It is similar to removing the strip from the ink from a computer printer. The only improvement I would make is to write instructions for this in the directions. There is o case, but I have the old one from the hurry cane I never used anyway. Excellent-
customer_reviews.author: Ethereal

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive lighted foldable walking stick.
customer_reviews.text: Clever. Rated to 250#, folds instantly to any of several bundle lengths and adjusts securely within 5" range. Multi-LED "headlight" comes with 4 button batteries and on-off switch. Attached lanyard can be used to hang up unit or to store store it compactly when folded. Lanyard has a tiny snap fastener, but buyers may find Velcro handier and easy to add their own for convenience. Slipping is always a risk, reduced with a 3-inch tip with 4 rubber grips pivoting easily to adjust to slanted or uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Long Live Prime!

customer_reviews.title: My Cane review
customer_reviews.text: Received the My Cane today. Pros: -Easily collapsed/stowed -Convenient attached light (batteries included) -Soft cushioned handle -Stands on its own on quad-style base Cons: -Handle has a smaller girth than most canes-even for my small hands -Cane does not feel as strurdy when walking as my Carex canes -Pivots only where the neck of the base attaches to the cane & has very little pivot motion
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight device is fragile.
customer_reviews.text: The cane body and tip itself is okay and sturdy, but the handle with light is not designed and constructed to endure. The handle is hard and uncomfortable, needs to be softer. The flashlight device broke the first time the cane was accidentally knocked over. The parts all flew in many directions, and after searching down on hands and knees (my hubby) all parts were found except for the light lens. Sadly, its the lens that keep the batteries and light intact inside the flashlight section, so now that part of the cane is useless and complicates using the cane as it now is. I ended up buying another cane. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: aerodach

customer_reviews.title: Seems OK
customer_reviews.text: It does everything its supposed to do. It folds, it's height adjustable. The light works, It stands by itself It seems a little "flimsy" If it does hold up I will update to 4 stars I've used it for two days now. I am particularly pleased with the "stand alone" feature. Beats trying to find a place to lean it. The base performs well. Works on hardwood floor, carpet, sidewalk and grass.. Very much a bargain at the price. I have found I do not use the folding feature. It fits nicely in my car without folding. The feature is good to have though. More like a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Adach Babaloochie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money by buying this piece of junk. It is cheaply made, The milling of each segment is shoddy. The light hardly worked and broke after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOU MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: The first time it fell over (which was the first day) the light never worked again. I though I had just bought one that was defective so I replace it and the same think happened. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Drury

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: I use this came for 2 months now. It folds up nicely, it is lightweight, the pivoting head provides excellent stability when walking, and the light is an added bonus. I forgot it at home when going to a weekend conference. I had to stop and get a substitute cane at a Walgreens. Not only was the quad cane $10 more expensive, but it didn't have a light, and the head didn't give it the way that this one does. It rocked up on the edge every time I stepped through. Having that experience made me realize what an excellent choice this Kane is.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Brott-Harsell

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cane because I had a knee replacement and I thought the light would also be perfect ....well this whole cane is not perfect very cheaply made does not stand up fell over and the light does not work so I purchased more batteries and it still doesn’t work do not waste your money it is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetqueen

customer_reviews.title: Fragile piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Initially I gave this cane a 5 star review. But now after just a few months use and being dropped a number of times, completely foreseeable being used by someone who is handicapped, the LED light no longer works. This product should be designed and engineered to withstand many drops over years of use and clearly is not. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of light issues
customer_reviews.text: Looked at MANY cane options while recovering from a broken ankle. Finally chose this one for price and because it had a cool light. Sadly, the light and batteries all fell out when we opened the bag, and could not be fixed. Would have returned but was too much trouble and needed the cane. Should have read more reviews and heeded them....
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: A great cane with practical features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after being a dufus and hurting my lower leg, ankle and foot. I weight 230 so I needed something that would hold most of my weight. This cane is very strong and will stand alone on a non-carpeted floor. I love the light. I have used it quite a bit and it still shines brightly. I bought a bicycle horn to lighten things up and it has been a conversation piece as well. I suppose a rear view mirror would make it street legal. I have no issues with this cane and would buy another if I can ever wear this one out. No signs of that.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reid

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for those needing more stability and function.
customer_reviews.text: This cane may be appropriate for someone who just needs a "little something" to help them get along. Since it comes apart = the cane is very unstable and feels as though it will come apart during use. It is lightweight, that is it's only good quality for someone disabled that cannot manage heavier items. Working in the health field I would not allow any of my patients to use this - not safe. My husband purchased thinking this might be a good option for him. We will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase for safety.
customer_reviews.text: My husband digressed about getting a cane that his Doctor suggested he needed for balance. This cane with quad base has him up and moving. It gives him the steadiness he needs and the light is perfect to show off as a "men with their toys" that they never outgrow. Actually the light is extremely handy when he gets up at night. Both he and I are glad he has this cane.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Great walking cane!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. It arrived pretty fast and he loved, first because it actually stands up not like the other brand heavily advertised on TV and which is more expensive. Second, he just loved the light. He also has trouble seeing in dark places and the light was a Big Plus! I am only giving it 4 stars because of the fact that walking canes will fall st one time or another. Inevitably, it happened to his several times and the poor and helpful light stopped working. We looked and looked and couldn't find a replacement light. I wish the manufacturer would have these replacements lights for sale!
customer_reviews.author: leticia curiel

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my Mom who has had some ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom who has had some stability issues and she just loves it. It's durable and reliable and she just loves the built in light. I think that the amount of support the cane provides the same as the Hurricane if not better. The pivoting head assures you that the cane isn't going to fly out from underneath you. I would certainly recommend buying it. It even arrived sooner than they initially said.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Owensby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last month and the flash light fell apart, and now the pivot is giving out.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Fryer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, more than the HC
customer_reviews.text: I already had 2 Hurry Canes, one for my house, one for my car. I lost the cane I used for shopping & when I had no luck in finding it and after several days I ordered this one. I really like it, more than the HC. It's lighter & the flexible base is bigger for more stability, because of the light i switched its use to my house & the other to my car. If you have the same cane but without the light I'd like to have that for my care to replace the heavier HC...Norma Williams
customer_reviews.author: Norma Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cane works fine, but' light ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite happy with the cane functionality. It is especially useful when walking over non-paved ground. On the second day, I realized the light was not working. Not infrequently, I stood the cane up near where I was sitting and then would knock it over when I arose. A part of the light assembly had been knocked loose somewhere. Amazon quickly offered a replacement once I returned the cane. I decided the light was not worth the bother of shipping back and doing without the cane for a week or so. It was the right decision for me.
customer_reviews.author: bud

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cane for my mother and she really really likes it... and she doesn't like anything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cane for my mother and she really really likes it... and she doesn't like anything! She thought she wouldn't like this kind of cane because she thought it might be more difficult to walk with, and would somehow make her trip. After using it a couple of times, She thought it was comfortable to use, and really got a kick out of the light and the fact that the light was adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: kittyboo2121

customer_reviews.title: Quad foot a mistake, light wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The quad base of this cane is not as stable as the tripod format. this means the cane is more likely to tip over when you stop walking and try to do something with both hands. Also I regularly tipped it over when it was standing next to my bed . PT wanted me to walk without a limp as I recovered, so encouraged me to go from crutches to cautious weight bearing gait as soon as possibe. The brillance is with adding the light--definitely could prevent a fall at night. The ability to fold the cane does also seem like a good feature, just not one I have used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the cane is made and of course the cost. The only problem I have had is that after 10 months the plastic bezel on the bottom that holds the rotating foot has broken. I can't come up with a way to fix this problem, but the cane still works, it's just not as stable. As far as the flashlight, I have used it a few times, but it's not something that would make my decision to repurchase it or not.
customer_reviews.author: My Review

customer_reviews.title: it isn't sturdy enough and wobbles too much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone with Parkinson's Disease who has severe balance issues. She can't use a regular cane with a small base, it isn't sturdy enough and wobbles too much. This cane does the trick, She gets the steadiness she needs from the larger base, but it is not so obtrusive like the one with the 4 leg base that seemed to get caught on things. This has been a very helpful device for her.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact there's a light on it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cane for my 94 year old mom who is dead set against canes because, "they are for old people". However, she fell and broke her arm last month and now we are insisting that she use the cane, and she actually likes it. I like the fact there's a light on it, and it stands up in place. So, none that cane-falling-down-and-making-you-trip-over-it. I think it's a great cane. It's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Poor threading of lens cap - not well matched or ...
customer_reviews.text: To: My Cane -Cons 1. Poor threading of lens cap - not well matched or always striaght- leads to intermittent flasligtht. 2. Painted over defects of top section tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle3x8

customer_reviews.title: Great first cane
customer_reviews.text: I am 43, with Cerebral Palsy and I had an ankle operation last year. I am using this cane to get up and down my house outdoor steps. The ease of the pivoting base does help with balance issues. I also like the way I can fold up the cane. Great first cane if you have balance issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Don't order it
customer_reviews.text: It took way to long to get here. It's little more then I thought. It's okay height wise. It's thickness is little. I took the little paper out of the light as directed. It worked came on went off. Next time it flickered out. Then I turned it off. I waited 3 minutes the light doesn't work at all. I'm not happy with it at all. If it wasn't so much trouble I'd send it back with it's new name the standing turd cane. Shaking my head.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moorehead

customer_reviews.title: Lightbroke within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The cane is light weight and its folding feature is great but the clear plastic that covers the LEDs already came off within days of use. This makes the light useless since the plastic cover is what holds the batteries in place.
customer_reviews.author: IED

customer_reviews.title: I very sturdy cane & comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This cane is very sturdy & compact. Very reasonably priced & the flashlight even works. I've used this can while recovering from foot surgery & given one to my elderly grandmother. This cane is my top pick & I'm not even in my 50's yet, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Cane Ok, Light Not
customer_reviews.text: Cane functions as cane ok. There is a problem: the light is very fragile and falls out regularly if the cane falls over. I would not recommend if you really need to depend on the light.
customer_reviews.author: BUDMAC

customer_reviews.title: Hello. I bought this item for my grandma. ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I bought this item for my grandma. But after 1 week of using it, lightening of the flash light became darker, and I notice that right now only 5 mini lights work instead of 6. What I should do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that it stands up by itself - that's an ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that it stands up by itself - that's an important quality for me. I also love that it extends to a height a few inches higher than most standard canes - the kinds that you can buy at CVS and Walgreens don't extend that high. I haven't used the flashlight yet, but it's an interesting feature. I have four canes now and this is by far my favorite one!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H

customer_reviews.title: annoying squeak
customer_reviews.text: it works ok, but after only a week or two it developed a squeak in the base. it's pretty annoying to have it squeak with each step. It's in the swivel part of the base, I think plastic on plastic. or there could be a metal piece in there. it's not accessible to try using WD40.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heinz

customer_reviews.title: I got one for my husband's heart attack. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I got one for my husband's heart attack. It provides for a safe walk while he builds up strength. Got one for mother-inlaw too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mentzel

customer_reviews.title: The headlight is very useful at night and throws a strong beam
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this is the cadillac of canes. My friends are envious by all it has to offer. The headlight is very useful at night and throws a strong beam. I love how it stands on its own when paying for my purchases. I am just 4'10" and it adjusted easily to my stature on the lowest level. Thank you My Cane.
customer_reviews.author: Gyn Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've never used it, because the base is too small
customer_reviews.author: acaciababy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Poor quality. When I opened this cane i thought it was a joke cane, like you would give as a gag gift. This cane is not for anyone with a medical condition where they may need extra support when mobile. I don't understand how anyone feels this is a good cane. If i could give it zero stars i would.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK M FORTE

customer_reviews.title: INVALUABLE CANE POST-SURGERY
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks following a total hip replacement I have found this cane an invaluable aid to my progressing mobility. I did so well during my Physical Therapsts visit this morning the therapist took down the My Cane contact info as she wishes to share it with her colleagues. Thank you a million times over for this outstanding product! I would recommend anyone going into surgery to order one pre-surgery as I wish I had!
customer_reviews.author: C. Woods

customer_reviews.title: I recommend purchase of this cane
customer_reviews.text: Cane was very easy to assemble. Problem - the light did not work. Upon advice from manufacture, I unscrewed the cap to remove a plastic there. I did not see any plastic cap. I finally went to a neighbor, and he knew - it was a piece of plastic film. Once he peeled it off, the light came on. I use the cane to help stabilize me when I walk around. The base works very well in giving me extra firm hold on the ground. I feel more confident going out now. I gave 4 stars because of the frustration in getting the light to work
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Dad wanted another one.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my elderly father. He accidentally broke the light on the first one, so I replaced it with another as a Christmas present. He truly enjoys it and uses the light with his reduced vision.
customer_reviews.author: K. Homsey

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Cane
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, attractive, strong cane that pivots slightly at the base to provide added stability. It also has a light function, which I haven't used yet. An excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: sandunga

customer_reviews.title: I've used it but not as much as my stander ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it but not as much as my stander canes. One reason is it minimum height. I can't drill more holes to make it lower for those days I need to adjust it. I have canes that I can drill additional holes to lower them.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Not so great after all
customer_reviews.text: Revised down to 2 stars. Flashlight soon died. Then, just days after spending $9 on replacement batteries, the flashlight literally fell apart. I noticed he quit using it at all and he said his old one actually feels more sturdy. Original review: Bought this for my Dad because his cane is always falling to the floor. He loves it so far. Surprisingly enough, he especially likes the built in flashlight because it helps him find his way to the restroom safely in the middle of the night. It does not stand on its own very well on carpet but does great on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves this cane! She usually doesn't use any canes. She used it for traveling when she knew too much walking would affect her knee. Great for packing and easy set up. The light especially helps at night.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: I love this cane
customer_reviews.text: I love this cane...I have tried a total 4 canes in the past year and this one has them all beat!!! It is by far lighter than any of the others! I love the way it actually tilts as you are walking giving you so much more security and last but not least it has a light for night time walking.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: but it has really been a great thing. If she stays somewhere unfamiliar she can ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother and she loves it. I did it initally as a joke...I mean, a cane with a headlight is hysterical, but it has really been a great thing. If she stays somewhere unfamiliar she can use it at night and not have to hold both a cane and flashlight and it came in handy walking in the evening near her home. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Baloga

customer_reviews.title: Great cane at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great cane at a great price, but it doesn't really work for me. It's a little too "springy" and does not provide the stability that I need. My issue is not a joint problem. I have an issue with instability because of a dead nerve. I wish this did work for me as it folds up and opens easily. I like the four point tip and the light. That little bit of "give" is probably good for many people, but a straight cane works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Cre Addict

customer_reviews.title: She really likes it and says that the bottom is very sturdy and it gives her more confidence especially outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 83 year old mother. She got it within a couple of days and had my father adjust the height for her. She really likes it and says that the bottom is very sturdy and it gives her more confidence especially outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G

customer_reviews.title: Light breaks easily!
customer_reviews.text: The first day, cane fell over and broke light. Easy to knock over and have to be careful when setting it down to stand. When it finally gives out, I will not buy this cane again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Ciliberti

customer_reviews.title: and it is very sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandfather, who's having hip surgery, and it is very sturdy and useful. My ONLY issue is that the base seems to have trouble staying upright on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Following my first purchase two weeks ago I bought a second cane to use at my weekend place. I suffer from a form of neuropathy which lessons the strength in my legs and impacts my balance. The cane is amazing. I never get up at night without it. The light insures safe movement when I get up in the dark. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great walking cane
customer_reviews.text: The cane was for my mother. at first she was not sure if it was as helpful. Now she absolutely loves it. She can make a confident steps while keeping her balance. The light is a great bonus at night she easily navigated to the bathroom. Thanks for great product
customer_reviews.author: Hank Moody

customer_reviews.title: Best of all the rest!  Old Dawg propven in action!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cane I have tried (and I have tried many). PT and RN approved, as well!
customer_reviews.author: The Old Dog

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cane and the light is bright at night without ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy cane and the light is bright at night without any other lights. Used after surgery and felt very secure in house. I would not recommend for walking in soft springtime mushy grass, but it works fine indoors or out on sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: This one is great for the higher ambulatory level patient who needs support ...
customer_reviews.text: As a Physical Therapist, I am constantly looking for canes. This one is great for the higher ambulatory level patient who needs support but wants to "fit in" and keep up w others. Provides adequate balance on uneven surfaces and folds well for convenience. JPC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cane for balance and security.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom and it is perfection. She feels secure and loves the fact that she doesn't have to lean a cane against something when she's busy. Easy to put together too. Out of the box and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: MLD5477

customer_reviews.title: A few more adjustment holes needed.
customer_reviews.text: It's needs to have a few more adjustment holes. I'm 5'7, it's still a little high for me on the last hole. Other than that it's a good steady cane and with the bigger tip it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: PCBirdy

customer_reviews.title: I like its ability to stand.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it doesn't fall all the time and stands by itsself. I do not trust it to hold my weight but then I is not really suppose to. For short walks, it is perfect. I wouldn't use it for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Jean

customer_reviews.title: Batteries is bad. Light doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It turns out that the batteries pack is bad after swapping out with my in-law unit. Not sure if they tested the batteries before shipping out.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Pham

customer_reviews.title: My Gram Loves IT
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 80 year old gram. LED light is bright and adjustable. Cane easily stands on its own and when bumped, wobbled but didn't fall. Handle is comfy. Cane is light and collapsible. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Great Cane for Taller Folks
customer_reviews.text: Great cane but not appropriate for anyone under 5' 2" or so. I'm 5' 0" and can't use it at all. it will not adjust small enough for us short folk. I gave it to a friend who's 5' 8". My friend loves it but it took a while to get used to the pivoting aspect of it. It feels rather different and unsteady at first but he loves it now.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter  Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great design and price
customer_reviews.text: Great design and price, I got alot of compliments when I used this while recovering from ankle surgery. I had no issues with the build quality of mine but I only used it for a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for frequent travelers!
customer_reviews.text: Cane is light weight and easy to use when traveling. Swivel base has worked well for stability on sloping ramps when cruising. Fits in suitcase when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to purchase this cane for my husband who has suffered a stroke. As a cane for walking assistance it works, the light is a P.O.C. The quad base works on some surfaces not all, it falls over on commercial carpet, similar to what some restaurants have. The lens fell out of the light and now the light doesn't even work! My husband doesn't use this cane all the time 3-4 times a week and has only had it since Oct. 5, 2017. For the price not really worth it, his standard worked just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, sturdy and more stylish than the regular medical canes. It's compact, so it's easier to get in and out of the car. The built-in flashlight is a nice bonus. I bought one for my father in law and my husband, and both are very pleased with this cane.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Enke Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Very utilitarian. I will be using it when I go to Israel.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Used this item when recovering from major surgery. Large ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this item when recovering from major surgery. Large footprint helps balance. Made of aluminum. OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: p2dog

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me and Iwas very surprised that it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this cane today and immediately noticed that the light did not work. When I tried to make it shorter the entire cane fell apart. This was recommended to me and Iwas very surprised that it was not checked out prior to shipping. Of course, I am shipping it back and will look for a more reliable cane.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H. McGarity

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cane for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The cane gives me extra stability walking on uneven surfaces, folds up quickly when I'm traveling, has a strong LED which pivots up and down allowing me to safely walk at night (I'm night blind due to diabetes), and just looks plain cool when I'm out on the town. You can't ask more than that from a cane.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the cane
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the cane. The quad footprint makes it more stable than the triangle. I am exspecially pleased with the light on the handle. Makes it very useful finding the right key to unlock the door to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient..
customer_reviews.text: Very hand and sturdy.. Can collapse it and place under my chair, so don't have to be concerned about where to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Marron

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Supports when walking, standing, and sitting; however, it does not stand well by itself.
customer_reviews.author: veggie librarian

customer_reviews.title: It is of poor quality. Attempts to correct functionality by adjusting contacts
customer_reviews.text: The cane was shipped quickly and was packaged well. It is simple to assemble and use. One issue is the integrated light. It is of poor quality. Attempts to correct functionality by adjusting contacts, changing batteries did not resolve the issue. If you're not concerned about the light function the cane serves its purpose well. If the light is a critical function for you it probably isn't reliable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Working perfectly for me. Having back issues and need some extra support when walking sometimes. Collapses and opens up quite nicely. I am on the heavier side and works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wade

customer_reviews.title: This is a knock off and you get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off and you get what you pay for Junk! It does not stand on its own
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Tips over easily, too tall for my grandmother
customer_reviews.text: I took apart the base and added weight, now it doesn't tip over so easy. Also I removed a section because it was too tall. This should be easier adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Nny

customer_reviews.title: Easily broke is why a low review
customer_reviews.text: Used for about a week. Cane fell & landed on carpet & led light broke. Didn't fall hard or on concrete but yet the light broke. Light not made very durable for use with cane. Easily broke is why a low review.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: but was able to remove one section that made it the perfect height.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom, and she loves it. It was a little to tall, but was able to remove one section that made it the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Sblack

customer_reviews.title: Not Resistant- Safety Concerns
customer_reviews.text: Not a long lasting product. The design is a great idea but it is very fragile. The product didn’t last six months. It broke on the base as using it to go down stairs. Be aware of safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Less comfortable than expected...but perhaps my expectations were too high.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This cane is not very sturdy, it falls over often and the light only worked once. I'm really disappointed that it didn't live up to the description. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: My life with My Cane
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! I have graduated from a walker to the cane and find it very handy and comfortable, especially when going out dining or shopping.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Cane, but my flashlight fell apart!
customer_reviews.text: I *want* to give this cane 5 stars, because it is super-easy to use and super-convenient. One of the main reasons I chose this one, however, was the LED flashlight in the handle... and on the second day of use, the flashlight assembly completely fell apart and I couldn't find all the pieces anymore. I drive a school bus, and early in the morning it's really dark, and that LED light was absolutely the best thing ever. I do still use the cane because, obviously, I need it to walk safely, but I sure do hope the company reads my review and helps me get the flashlight fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Wood

customer_reviews.title: It is very steady. I wish they had replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very steady. I wish they had replacement parts for the flashlight. Flashlight broke when I dropped cane on street.
customer_reviews.author: Neal F. Dye

customer_reviews.title: maybe not such a great idea
customer_reviews.text: Cane Works fine...its a stick ! The light never worked, today it just fell apart...bulb, lens, battery all on the floor, spring cannot be found ! Save your money! Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: bernard porchenick

customer_reviews.title: Has been a life saver for my husband. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Has been a life saver for my husband. He has to have a knee replacement surgery next month and this has helped so much with getting out of bed and his chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great folding cane with nice Quad base
customer_reviews.text: This is a practical folding cane. Well made, good height and overall practical and functional. The Quad Base makes it very safe and secure for balance and walking. Glad I purchased this for a dear friend.
customer_reviews.author: Prima chica

customer_reviews.title: Falls over a lot
customer_reviews.text: It falls over a lot. The light only lasted a few months. Overall, it a useable cane, but don’t buy it for the light.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA J

customer_reviews.title: Great Cane.
customer_reviews.text: This a really great cane for me. I don't go out much at night but when I do this light is very useful. The cane cane is very stabilizing at all times. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sara a Clark

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time...already receiving compliments from the gift recipient that the cane helps stabilize him being a recent stroke survivor and the light is a bonus for taking the dog for his walk!
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaB

customer_reviews.title: Love My Cane! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Such a strong reliable cane! I am 5'3 and it is perfect height for me! Love the light very bright! I have dropped it more than a few times and it is still standing strong! Breaks down and fits into my bag/purse. Thinking about buying another to have a extra just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Wunder

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to supplement my walker after my Myasthenia Gravis crisis. I'm 5'11" tall and weigh 195 lbs. This cane is sturdy enough to support and stabilize my walking. I love that is a folding cane due to the fact that I don't need it at all times, but is convenient when needed. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this cane. The flexibility it offers is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: It works better for her than a conventional cane because it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cane for my unstable but otherwise healthy 97 year old mother in law. It helps her get around without falling. It works better for her than a conventional cane because it doesn't slip out from under her.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Wickert

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product in preparation of an upcoming surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in preparation of an upcoming surgery. I have tested it and it is solid and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Passanisi

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the cane is good.
customer_reviews.text: My cane fell over and the light part broke. Otherwise the cane is good.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Kleffner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight lasted a day when the cane was tipped over. Feels cheap
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: they especially like the flashlight
customer_reviews.text: everyone i see compliments it, they especially like the flashlight. i tell them i bought on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grandfather loves it and has more stability with it and the light helps him at night.
customer_reviews.author: Opaquemeerkat

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea - wish it worked.
customer_reviews.text: The cane is fine, but the light quit working very quickly and then fell apart. With the empty light socket, it just looked like a piece of junk. Also, the bottom that was supposed to hold the cane up never did work and it fell over constantly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zapor

product_meta.title: My Cane – Pivoting Quad Base, Folding Cane with Adjustable led Light and Cushion Handle
product_meta.description:
My Cane – Pivoting Quad Base, Folding Cane with Adjustable led light and cushion handle.

Now you can walk up and down those challenging hills confidently.

Take those stairs with ease and never let uneven terrain get between you and doing what you love.

My Cane is the added support you need to ensure you’re able to do the daily things you enjoy.

It’s sturdy enough to safely support up to 250 LBS but weighs less than 1.10LBS so you can always have it by your side.

My Cane comes with 6 built-in LED lights that can be adjusted to point the light where ever you need it.
feature_bullets: COLLAPSIBLE AND COMPACT- not like wooden or plastic Walking stick this aluminum cane is very lightweight it can be quickly folded To fit in your handbag or in your traveling bag when you travel around the world
LIGHTWEIGHT & WATERPROOF- My Cane standing walking cane,made with Strong aluminum alloy free with a maximum user weight of 250 lbs, Great for men , women ,this IS a great classic walking cane
STURDY & SAFETY- SLIP-FALL RESISTANT-Pivoting bottom for easy walk any type of terrain indoore outdoor like park , in the rain ,or snow ,Cushion handle for extra comfort and safety
BUILT- IN LED LIGHTS-Adjustable 6 white bright LED lights , for your safety flashlight direction can be adjusted to meet your needs when walking at night (batteries included)
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE- My Cane offers a 100% satisfaction guarantee if you are not happy with your cane we will refund you the money no questions asked
